content: neck trim measures ¾ /2 cm finishing buttonhole row 1 rs work to first marker *remove wet block all sweater pieces and lightly pin to finished marker bobble 2 work in 2x2 ribbing to next marker repeat measurements from * to final marker work in 2x2 ribbing to end join shoulder seams using mattress stitch and smooth buttonhole row 2 ws work as established to bound-off yarn set in sleeves and seam using mattress stitch and stitches co 2 sts using backwards loop method repeat to smooth yarn end of row sew side and underarm seams using mattress stitch and continue even in 2x2 ribbing until neck trim measures smooth yarn 1½ /4 cm bobble all sts sew on buttons and weave in final ends if you re having difficulty viewing or printing our pdf patterns please ensure you have the
